TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueAccessControlEntry extends System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry

summary.span: 为受信者（用户、组或计算机）指定执行消息队列任务的访问权限。

span.span: Specifies access rights for a trustee (user, group, or computer) to perform Message Queuing tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类指定要应用于受信者的权限。Use the class to specify rights to apply to a trustee. 这些权限包括扫视、接收或发送消息;查看或修改队列属性或权限;和删除队列。These rights include peeking, receiving, or sending messages; viewing or modifying queue properties or permissions; and deleting queues. 类的 方法提供重载，用于将此类的实例直接传递到方法，或将此类的实例添加到 的实例，使你可以一次添加多个受信者的权限。The class's method provides overloads for passing an instance of this class directly into the method, or adding it to an instance of so that you can add rights for more than one trustee at a time. 新的访问权限追加到队列的自由访问控制列表（DACL）的末尾，后者标识可访问该队列的用户和组。The new access right is appended to the end of the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL), which identifies the users and groups that can access the queue. 此通用化的一些例外情况涉及到添加新权限的位置及其效果。There are some exceptions to this generalization about where the new right is added and its effects. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 构造函数的重载允许您指定一个 成员，以指示是允许还是拒绝对受信者的权限。An overload of the constructor allows you specify a member to indicate whether to allow or deny rights to the trustee. 资源的 DACL 中允许或拒绝权限的顺序会影响受信者是否具有指定的权限。The order in which rights are allowed or denied in the resource's DACL affects whether the trustee has the specified rights. 例如，如果已向受信者授予了权限，并且以后添加了拒绝这些权限的条目，则系统首先会查找已授予的权限，因此，如果用户被授予了这些权限，则可能会被拒绝。For example, if rights have already been granted to the trustee and you later add an entry that denies them, the system finds the granted rights first, so the user is granted rights you might have intended they be denied. 你可以使用两个项类型来重写此行为： `Set` 和 `Revoke`。You can use two entry types to override this behavior: `Set` and `Revoke`. 有关控制访问权限的确定方式的详细信息，请参阅 枚举主题。For more information about controlling the way in which access rights are determined, see the enumeration topic. 类与基于访问控制列表（Acl）的安全性关联，你可以使用该列表来向用户提供对消息队列系统本身的访问权限。The class is associated with security based on access control lists (ACLs), which you can use to give users access to the Message Queuing system itself. 这与代码访问安全性不同，代码访问安全性是通过 和相关类实现的。This is different from code access security, which is implemented through the and related classes. 消息队列代码访问安全性定义应用程序可能需要的特定于队列的操作或队列访问权限，这些操作受安全控制的限制;它不代表应用程序执行这些操作，也不表示其自身的接收访问权限。Message Queuing code access security defines queue-specific operations or queue access that an application might require which is subject to security control; it does not represent a right for the application to perform these operations or receive access in and of itself. 有关代码访问安全性的详细信息，请参阅主题[代码访问安全性](/dotnet/framework/misc/code-access-security)。See the topic [Code Access Security](/dotnet/framework/misc/code-access-security) for more information about code access security. 若要设置受信者的消息队列权限，请创建 类的新实例，并将其传递到 构造函数的重载。To set message queue permissions for a trustee, create a new instance of the class and pass it into an overload of the constructor. 指定消息队列访问权限，方法是将 的实例传递给构造函数，或者通过设置现有 实例上的 属性。Specify the message queue access rights either by passing an instance of into the constructor or by setting the property on an existing instance. 然后，可以将 实例直接传递到 方法，或在调用 之前，将条目添加到 的实例。You can then pass the instance directly to the method, or alternately add the entry to an instance of before calling .

summary.span: 通过指定的受信者和消息队列访问权限初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights) cil managed
Public Sub New (trustee As Trustee, rights As MessageQueueAccessRights)

param.name: trustee
param.span: 指定用户、组、计算机、域或别名的 。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的按位组合，定义要授予受信者的权限组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并且向指定受信者授予指定的消息队列访问权限。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, granting the specified Message Queuing access rights to the specified trustee.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数的此重载将权限授予指定的受信者。Use this overload of the constructor to grant rights to the specified trustee. 在 `rights` 参数中指定的权限是 位标志的成员的按位组合，其中包括接收消息、删除队列和设置队列属性之类的权限。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 构造函数使用传入的权限设置此实例的 属性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 将 的此实例直接传递到 方法的重载，以便仅向此受信者授予权限，或将此实例添加到 ，然后调用 以一次向多个受信者授予或拒绝权限。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public MessageQueueAccessControlEntry (System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType) cil managed
Public Sub New (trustee As Trustee, rights As MessageQueueAccessRights, entryType As AccessControlEntryType)

param.name: trustee
param.span: 指定用户、组、计算机、域或别名的 。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的按位组合，定义要授予受信者的权限组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

param.name: entryType
param.span: 值之一，指定是允许、拒绝、设置还是撤消指定的权限。

span.span: One of the values, which specifies whether to allow, deny, set or revoke the specified rights.

summary.span: 通过指定的受信者和消息队列访问权限，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

summary.span: 传入的项类型定义访问的类型（例如 或 ）。

span.span: The type of access (such as or ) is defined by the entry type you pass in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数的此重载可授予或拒绝指定的受信者的权限。Use this overload of the constructor to grant or deny rights to the specified trustee. 在 `rights` 参数中指定的权限是 位标志的成员的按位组合，其中包括接收消息、删除队列和设置队列属性之类的权限。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 构造函数使用传入的权限设置此实例的 属性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 有关授予或拒绝权限的详细信息，请参阅 主题。For more information about granting or denying rights, see the topic. 对于两个成员（`Allow` 和 `Deny`），可能存在预先存在的可能矛盾的访问权限，因此，队列的自由访问控制列表（DACL）中显示权限的顺序会影响是否最终获得权限。For two members, `Allow` and `Deny`, there may be preexisting and possibly contradictory access rights, so the order in which the rights appear in the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL) affects whether the right is ultimately granted. 另外两个成员（`Set` 和 `Revoke`）将覆盖任何现有权限。Two other members, `Set` and `Revoke`, overwrite any existing rights. 使用其行为适用于你的应用程序的成员。Use the member whose behavior is applicable to your application. 将 的此实例直接传递到 方法的重载，以便仅向此受信者授予或拒绝权限，或将此实例添加到 ，然后调用 以同时向多个受信者授予或拒绝权限。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant or deny rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights MessageQueueAccessRights { System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights value); };
member this.MessageQueueAccessRights : System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于该受信者的消息队列特定的权限集。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of Message Queuing-specific rights to apply to the trustee.
A bitwise combination of the members.

value.span: 默认值是由传入构造函数的 参数定义的。

span.span: The default is defined by the parameter passed into the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 属性，您可以指定特定于消息队列对象的权限，如接收、查看或写入消息，或设置队列属性。The property enables you to specify Message Queuing object-specific rights such as receiving, peeking, or writing messages, or setting queue properties. 此属性的值由 构造函数设置，但您可以在调用 之前随时更改此属性的值。The value of this property is set by the constructor, but you can change it at any time before using this instance of in a call to .
